cards.name: Vephire
cards.description: Vephire is a majestic pokemon that walks through forests with its regal armor, looking like a king among its peers. It has a tranquil demeanor that belies its hidden power. The Foliage Lash ability allows Vephire to manipulate its environment into a weapon, creating vines and branches to deliver powerful blows to its opponents. By day, Vephire can be found admiring the beauty of its natural surroundings, but at night it protects its home with fierce determination.
cards.image_prompt: Vephire::0 a epic grass-type acid pokemon::2.5, wearing regal armor, in a woods environment, sunlight ray ambience, anime sketch --niji --ar 3:2
